description: Bandpass filtering of time series data in AFNI *.1D files

fbot.title: Lowest Frequency
fbot.description: Lowest frequency in the passband, in Hz (must be greater than or equal to 0)

ftop.title: Highest Frequency
ftop.description: Highest frequency in the passband, in Hz (must be greater than FBOT)

infile.title: Input File
infile.description: Input AFNI *.1D file; each column is processed

timestep.title: Time Step
timestep.description: Set time step to 'dd' sec (default is 1.0)

ortfile.title: Orthogonalize File
ortfile.description: Also orthogonalize input to columns in specified *.1D file (only one '-ort' option is allowed)

nodetrend.title: No Detrending
nodetrend.description: Skip the quadratic detrending of the input

norm.title: Normalize
norm.description: Make output time series have L2 norm = 1
